page.title: 12EVANGELICAL CHURCH HENFIELD.
page.content: The Evangelical Free Church by Daniel. My Church is the Free Church in the village. It is a medium sized church and has a Sunday School building built on. The actual Church has about forty benches and two aisles. Where the vicar stands is a preaching box with a Bible in it. In the left hand corner there is an organ. In front of that there are two steps going down into the aisle. The Sunday School building is fairly large with a piano and two tables at one end. At the sides there are chairs for people to sit on. Near the tables is a door which leads into a kitchen. At Sunday School we sing songs and say prayers. We have a collection and go to our classes. In our classes we have sheets of paper and we learn about God. After our classes we go home. Our Church is in the High Street.
